import React from 'react'; import cardLogo from '../Images/Circles.png' import './CardDetails.scss'; export default function CardDetails() { const cardData = [ { cardId: 1, bank: "Purity UI", cardNumber: "781221390823XXXX", cardExpiry: "05/24", cardCVV: "09X" } ] console.log(cardData[0].cardNumber.substring(" ", 4)); const cardLoop = cardData.map((data , index) =>

{data.bank}

{data.cardNumber.replace(/\W/gi, '').replace(/(.{4})/g, '$1 ')};
VALID THRU

{data.cardExpiry}

CVV

{data.cardCVV}

) return ( <> {cardLoop} ) }
